Title: Everything You Need to Know: An Encyclopedia for Inquiring Young Minds
Author: ডেবোরা মুর‍্যাল
Summary: Readers' imaginations will be fired on every page with this wonderful single-volume encyclopedia. The book is arranged thematically into ten core topics: Earth, Space, Science,Machines, My Body, People and Places, History, Dinosaurs, Plants and Animals. A range of informative and interactive features perfectly enhance and consolidate each reference section.
Book_Title: Everything You Need to Know: An Encyclopedia for Inquiring Young Minds
